page.title: 07Whaddon Church
page.content: We walked to a big church with two pulpits and a nice brass eagle for the bible. In Whaddon church there was a font and the font was wooden with a carved pigeon on top. There wwere lots of doors with curtains over them. I have never seen such a big bible in my life. In one of the seats there were foot rests and the to of them opens up and you could put things in it. The bridesmaids would sit there when people got married. There was some detail of the church: it said look for the peacocks fighting over a piece of bread. It was on the pillar. And it said look for the peacocks' feathers on the angels' wings, and it was on one of the stained glass windows and as you looked closer you could see more of them. You could see the bell strings. There were about seven strings and a lovely organ.
